content: cut yarn repeat again row 18 to 31 with the last 5 st do not weave in ends you can also make smaller leaves with scrap yarn and add them to the bag make sure the yarn used is non-washable and felts well felting with the high agitation cycle on your washing machine and the water temperature setting on warm felt the bag and the leaves putting the leaves in the small mesh bag if available stop the machine often to check the felting process spreading the lobes of the leaves individual stitches should be hard to tell apart but still discernable felting the bag will take less time than the leaves while still wet lightly stretch the bag and the handles into form do the same with the decorative leaves finishing cut the tails from the felted bag and decorative pieces no need to weave in ends hurray sew the decorative pieces to the basis of the handles using illustration or your imagination for guide happy halloween stay safe and have fun out there
